storyInfo: The Sanguinarch rushes to the battlefield. Using 'Teekaz blood' preserved for millennia, he completes the last step of the ritual. Something is about to be born atop The Shard. Amiya and Logos confront him.

attributes.text: How dull.
Did you think this would anger me? Offend me?
\nDid you think I would kick your corpse in anger? Curse your insolence?
I'm not going to do any of that, Lettou. René Lettou.
\nInsignificant man... same as the land itself in my eyes, an annoyance.
Did you think this act could give meaning to your pathetic life?
\nStill so conceited, Lettou.
\nI won't give you another thought, not so much as a momentary glance.

attributes.content: ...Theresis.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Vampire.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: If memory serves, I have some sort of role in your hypocritical 'Military Commission'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But I haven't seen a war report from you in quite some time?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Nor have you attended any Commission meetings in quite some time.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You've always held the requisite command authority.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: 'Command authority.'
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I don't need to command my offspring, they serve me naturally, they serve their court.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Then you need to manage them better.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The war's end approaches, and your underlings need to play a more significant role. Their wanton behavior vexes me.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The western front is wasting time.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: This is necessary for the ritual.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Without enough blood and tears, how are we supposed to gather enough material for the witchcraft?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You and Theresa told me about the ancient door you found, covered in scabs.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Is the source of all Sarkaz suffering, the origin of our fate, really behind that door?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The preparations for the ritual are complete.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: But one of the nodes, the town of Brentwood, is under attack by our enemies.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Are you dispatching me to resolve these trifling nuisances for you, Theresis?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Oh, that reminds me, oh revered 'Regent' of the Military Commission—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Since the Commission has noted this is such a crucial town, why did it not prepare any significant defense?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: No shrouded casters, meat puppets, or any haphazardly bewitched, flesh-woven brutes?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: ...I indulged you and your sister on account of your dazzlingly powerful souls.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Weak Sarkaz call you Regent, and the Confessarii have gathered around you, bringing Theresa back to you.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The Regent and the resurrected 'King of Sarkaz', what a fascinating pair of siblings.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But all of this owes to your actions, your power, not your... status.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Power.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I have blessed this battlefield in order to cast the grandest of curses.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I, in my benevolence as head of one of the oldest of the courts, have awakened the power hidden within the blood of the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And so, Theresis, have you felt it? Does my boon delight you?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Oh, but how much power can be drawn from your mixed blood?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The end is near, it's making you restless.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Conceal your weakness.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Or shall I say, do you need a reminder or two?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I will complete the final part of the ritual for you, proud Regent.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But it is not in service of the narrow ambitions of you and your sister, eyes always fixed on that nomadic city bearing the false name of Kazdel.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: It's just another resting place in that painful river.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Theresa is ready.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The Shard will soon unleash a power that Victoria could never imagine.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The skeleton is waiting in the hub outside the encampment, you can go from there to Brentwood.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Exciting, isn't it...? Theresis, you always wear such dull, lifeless faces.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I've seen it. A black light rising over the horizon, like a wall of obsidian, that will eventually found a real city.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Heh... You mock my impatience, but isn't silence the best way to conceal your deepest thoughts?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: If only I could go back in time to see it for myself.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: If you really can retrieve the power that could reshape this great land, that which the Sarkaz first reached out to touch... 'Originium'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Then I will, on your behalf, spread the name of Kazdel to every scrap of land I set foot on.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: The Sarkaz, my people, have abandoned their past for too long.
\nThey hate, they curse, they swear revenge upon our enemies.
So disappointing.
\nMy people have forgotten even the origin of their bloodline, forgotten the names of our ancestors.
\nThey mate in numbness and sorrow, giving birth to generations of hideous, mixed-blood offspring.
\nThey throw themselves into the shadows of the nomadic cities, hiding in the streets, begging invaders for food.
I have lost interest in Victorian blood, and the Sarkaz who are satisfied with it... they infuriate me even more.
\nFrom the moment Sarkaz first called themselves Sarkaz, from the moment this 'world' alienated them—
\nIt's enough to drive one mad with rage.

attributes.content: My Prince, the drifting of the Feranmut is about to end, and we will soon arrive at the waystation near Brentwood.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: The town has been occupied by Victorians, and they are clearing out your creations.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Creations?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Those mindless insects are nothing more than a few drops of residual blood carelessly spilled by children of the Crimson Court while painting runes on crystals.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Let the Victorians celebrate their 'victory'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: My mistake. Forgive me, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.text: I look to the Military Commission's Major, a Sarkaz.
\nTheresis has arranged so many children to wander outside the court in this system of his.

attributes.content: You are called Ulšulah.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: ...Yes, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Your blood is mixed with too much alcohol. I can forgive hedonism and indulgence.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But your hesitation disappoints.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I can wash those away for you, 'Major'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: ...I am grateful for your benevolence, My Prince, but I can... handle myself. I... will endeavor to do better.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.text: She bows her head, the nerves have gripped her.
\nBut at least these mixed-blood children understand how to resist, which compensates somewhat for their ignorance.

attributes.content: Ulšulah... Ulšulah...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Ulšulah the Time-Stealer. A popular household story.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Hah, 'Ulšulah' has taken the reins of this particular skeleton. Amusing.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Just a coincidence, Your Highness. When I took the name, I never thought I would really be any kind of hero—
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Hero?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Ulšulah was a coward.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: He couldn't even look directly into the eyes of this Feranmut, daring only to hide in the turbulent currents it stirred up, waking some of the people immersed in illusion.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: So I sent him on such a mission, of course, 'to save many people.'
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: Hollow murmurs echo throughout the space.

attributes.content: What is it? Have recognized me at last?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: Dead silence.
\nIts intelligence has long been stripped away. Only an empty shell remains to react.

attributes.content: My Prince, we are nearly there.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: We may encounter some illusions—
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: No need to remind me.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I've dealt with this one far more than you ever have.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: The ashen Kazdel, sent to its doom in Diαbolic flames.
\nThey sweep through the tents of all the clans.
\nI can hear the roar of the flames, I can hear the lamentations of the flames.
Why are we still surrendering? Why are we still weak?
\nAre you satisfied with this?
\nAre you satisfied?!
\nThen I, on your behalf—
My ancient kin kneel and weep in the ruins.
\nThe King of Sarkaz is dead.
\nThe King killed the King.
\nI know he is just a ripple in the illusion.
\nI know this is our unchangeable history.

attributes.content: (In ancient Sarkaz) You worked hard to build this ashen Kazdel, and the Sarkaz have a home again.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: (In ancient Sarkaz) But doesn't its diminutive size infuriate you?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: (In ancient Sarkaz) The outblood invaders deprived the Teekaz of their ancestral land. So, you started to compromise, shrinking and distorting that which stands for your home.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: (In ancient Sarkaz) To a plain, a circle of fields, until you can only call it your city, your village.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: (In ancient Sarkaz) This is the starting point of Sarkaz weakness.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: (In ancient Sarkaz) And now, I look back from the endpoint.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The illusions are over.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: This skeleton has returned to its lair.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: My Prince... it is my duty to remind you that the forces in control of the Brentwood core Arts Circle are nearby.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: They may not be aware that the skeleton leaves a trace. Our return may have been exposed.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Your power is undeniable, but among our enemies, there may be...
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: No matter.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Have our enemies destroyed the ritual nodes?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The battlefield Arts Circles cast by this skeleton were merely the tendrils, extremities of the Crimson Court's grasp.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: In any case, since we've come to the end...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Allow me to personally stand as the center of this most ancient ritual—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: The sun is rising, and the first rays of blood red have already spilled through the damaged cave of the waystation.
\nA new day.
\nBut this day will be different from all the sorrowful days that have come before.

attributes.content: 'Farchaser', eh? The crowned hunter, our first King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: If your soul still lingers among the myriad after thousands of years—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: Enough dark clouds have accumulated atop the spire known as The Shard.
\nThe foolish Victorians see this storm as nothing more than a spear to be thrown.
\nHow shallow, their inherently corrupt nature, always inclined toward conflict.
I close my eyes, feeling the Arts Circles composed of blood-red crystals, feeling all the blood that has flowed through this land since the war—No, since we degraded ourselves into Sarkaz.
\nThey tremble at my mercy, they boil at my call.

attributes.content: If you watch us yet, the descendants of your lost homeland...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: If those distant legends that have been distorted and painted over are not lies—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Let the suffering in that cradle descend again.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Let us... reclaim the lost fate of the Teekaz.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: A drop of blood drips from my eye.
\nIt flows down my face.
Such a distant voice answers me.
\nIt's as if I could reach out and touch it.
\nThat door, long buried in dust and smoke, is slowly loosening.
\nThe storm over Londinium is playing a new movement.
\nHm, it seems, something is missing...
A loud noise.

attributes.content: ...As we thought, the Victorians are attacking here.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: We will do what we can to buy you time to complete the ritual, My Prince.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: The Victorians? Heh.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Theresis, you really have surprised me.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: No, no, girl called Ulšulah, we are not facing any such 'Victorians'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Our guests deserve to witness this moment.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Another pureblood, still a young knell.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And the usurper 'King of Sarkaz'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: No matter who they are, the Military Commission's plan must be executed.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: I'll strengthen my connection with the Feranmut as much as possible, in order to prevent them from reaching this place.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: My Prince, please—
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: You have no standing from which to advise me.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Ah, I do so want to see—What cliches will they spout at me this time? What moments of despair can they show me?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Now then, 'Major', you stay here.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: This dispensable work of yours is over.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: How many years have these hollow skeletons gone unfilled? Four centuries? Five?
At the time, I was not yet master of the Crimson Court.
\nAt the time, I could still hear the arrogant whispers of the putrid War King, I could hear the sounds of the Arch-liar of Djall, torturing the night away.
\nAt the time, even if the Vampires were hostile to them, these mighty souls surging with hatred and faith made my heart swell.
\nAt the time, the Sarkaz were already a scattered people with no home to call their own. But at the time, I could see the remnants of their proud souls.

attributes.content: 'Ruin'.

attributes.text: A sea of blood devours the curse.

attributes.content: Are you still toying with these pathetic words, these false curses, Banshee?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Why don't you face the power that truly belongs to you, the power gathered in your blood?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Isn't the elegy you can sing now so much more melodious?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Alas, you are silent, never to open your mouth.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Vampire.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: What is it you are trying to reach?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: This is no ritual recorded in Sarkaz literature.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: What is it... calling?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's... I think I see a... 'seed'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You... you're trying to awaken it with millennia-old witchcraft, to nourish it with the Arts Circles on the battlefields, and control it with the storm over The Shard.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You must be stopped!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You'll destroy Londinium! It'll be nothing but a heap of rubble full of Originium!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, not only that... at this scale, with this much power... I can even see...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The revenge of the Sarkaz will drag all of Terra into the abyss.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...'Revenge'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Cautus, you still claim to be the King of Sarkaz, but your views are so biased.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Two hundred years ago, a coalition of Terran nations destroyed Kazdel once.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And now, do you think we would bring pain and destruction to Victoria as simple vengeance for their conquest two centuries ago?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Sigh... I am disappointed once again.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The Black Crown lingers over your head, and indeed, this is yet another ridiculous thing wrought by the 'King of Sarkaz'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Killing an enemy and butchering a country, burying a city and annihilating a culture, these things are not different, for the Sarkaz, these are far from enough to be called resistance.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: We've come to Londinium, this outblood capital, not for any kind of 'retaliation'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: 'Seed'? Not a bad description.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Watch and see what sights this seed will bring.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You're a narrow-minded one, Vampire.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: No flowery words can change the nature of what it is you're doing.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: You call me silent?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Rest assured, Vampire, you will hear me speak.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: 'Fetters, fall heavy on your body.'
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Amiya!
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.text: The Black Crown appears over the outblood's head.
\nA black spear pierces my scapula.

attributes.content: What? So easy—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: —No! It's not!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Ah... fresh blood gushes out. The King of Sarkaz has opened a wound for me.
\nThis is the blood so preciously bestowed to me and my ancestors for millennia.
I carefully select the blood of my choice.
\nThe masters of the Crimson Court have a responsibility to, day after day, wipe away even the most minute hint of impurity.
\nBut the reason we are so pure is not that this bloodline has never been lost, never been defiled.
\nBut because—
I've finally found it.
\nA drop of blood.
\nIt has been passed down through the millennia—
\nTeekaz blood.
The land falls silent, the rivers stagnate, the air moans.
\nThe entire world turns solemn.
\nAs I reach out my hand, it floats slowly in front of me. It does not drip.
\nIt only goes up, up...

attributes.content: His blood!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He's going to complete the ritual!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Teekaz blood is now gone from our world.

attributes.content: ...! The incantation left in Londinium was just destroyed in that instant.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: What's happened in Londinium?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Amiya, end this battle quickly, I feel some kind of—
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Don't be so hasty, honored guests.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: Blood crawls over the bones—
\nBloodstains emerge from the decay.

attributes.content: It's just such a great opportunity.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: In the sight of the first curse—perhaps today, we...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Can bid farewell to the last 'King of Sarkaz'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires
